Name:
* Marina Shainova RUS disqualified for an anti-doping rule violation according to IOC Disciplinary Commissions desicion of August 29 2016. 




Women's Lightweight - Weightlifting - Beijing 2008 Summer Olympics
Event Format:
     
     In weightlifting the total score for a lifter was the sum of the lifter's result in the snatch and the clean & jerk categories. Three lifts was allowed in each category. In case of a tie, the lighter lifter won. Lifters without a valid snatch score did not perform the clean & jerk category. Event facts: Women's Lightweight competition was held at the Beijing University of Aeronautics Gymnasium and 12 athletes participated in the event. 





These results for Women's Lightweight - Beijing 2008 Summer Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database
